short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize your shopping wishlist effortlessly. Fluo helps you scrape and save product info into your account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fluo is the ultimate Chrome extension for anyone who loves shopping and wants to stay organized. With Fluo, you can effortlessly save and manage products from any website into your personal wishlist. Whether youâ€™re comparing prices, planning gifts, or organizing future purchases, Fluo has you covered.

- Save Product Information Instantly
- Organize Your Wishlist
- Sync with Your Account
- Quick and Intuitive
- Smart Insights, Pricing Tracking, and Product Comparison (Coming Soon)

How It Works
1. Add Fluo to your Chrome browser and pin the extension for easy access.
2. Browse any shopping website and find a product you want to save.
3. Click on the Fluo icon in the toolbar to open the extension.
4. Review the product details (name, price, image, URL), and save it to your wishlist.

Who Is Fluo For?
- Smart Shoppers: Compare prices and save details across multiple stores.
- Gift Planners: Keep track of gift ideas and make holiday shopping stress-free.
- Organized Buyers: Plan future purchases and stay on budget with an organized wishlist.
